name: Child's Lamb Costume
description: I originally free-handed this project for my son’s nativity lamb costume, but have recreated it so others can knit it as well. This is the first pattern I have written, so please send me any corrections or suggestions (ravatar: tinto).
suggested_yarn: Lion Brand Wool Ease Thick & Quick
full_text: I originally free-handed this project for my son’s nativity lamb costume, but have recreated it so others can knit it as well. This is the first pattern I have written, so please send me any corrections or suggestions (ravatar: tinto).
